scenario.name: register_client
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[$domain]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 10 Expires: 120 User-Agent: [$ua] Content-Length: 0
